description: Thomson is a company that manufactures growth flasks and filtration equipment to sell to biotech labs worldwide. Currently, work as a lead developer and graphic designer. Throughout my employment, I have successfully redesigned, coded, and launched the company website multiple times as the company evolved. Also spearheaded a complete rebranding twice. Additionally have designed and built many internal applications for use by customers and in-house staff.
bullets: Responsible for website and internal applications
All product photography, illustration & video production

description: AK illustrations was a self-employed business providing comprehensive print and web design services and marketing consultation. Mission was to provide services at a high standard while educating the client to take over campaigns on contract completion. Clients ranged from startups to large companies.

A Franchise sign company, producing everything from business cards to illuminated channel letters. Hired as a graphic designer and production assistant. Left company as production manager and lead graphic designer.
bullets: Design and layout of print marketing and signage
Consult on design, city code requirements, and cost of a project
Maintain vendor accounts, material selection, and purchase
Manage manufacture and installation of the final product

description: Hunter Legal Graphics specializes in technical illustration and detailed scale models. Hired as a technical illustrator and graphic designer, also worked on teams to build scale models for courtroom presentations.
bullets: Precise technical illustration for patent application
Brochure and catalog design and layout
